name: Nelson Nordic Ski Club
description: Nelson Nordic welcomes everyone! Ski 30kms of groomed, classic/skate trails, along riverbanks and meadows, climb Clearwater to ring the "bell”, bring headlamps or night ski the 1.5km lighted loop, ski 1.5kms of “Cottonwood” with Fido or warmup with your hot chocolate in our rustic lodge before meandering through our snowshoe network.
